Package com.adamsvestka.pijl.rerecodex.Model

Class Group

java.lang.Object
com.adamsvestka.pijl.rerecodex.Model.Observable<Group>
com.adamsvestka.pijl.rerecodex.Model.Group
public class Group extends Observable<Group>
A Group can represent many different structures in ReCodEx, however here it is distilled to only a study group. Each Group has a list of students, a list of primary administrators (teachers), and a list of assignments. The Group class extends Observable<Group> to provide update notifications to subscribers. This class handles loading data from ReCodEx API response payloads and provides methods to build and manage a Group object.

Key data attributes for a Group include its ID, name, description, and participating students, primary administrators, and assignments.

The class provides additional utility methods for loading data from response payload objects and handling API requests to load statistics related to the content of the group, such as assignment details.

See Also:
